title: commands
description: A list of all the available commands.
longDescription: A list of all the available commands.
*Some commands have longer descriptions once you open their specific help page.*

access-list.title: access-list <SUB>
access-list.description: Used to manage User and Role Blacklists/Whitelists.

banana.title: banana
banana.description: Gets a random Banana GIF from Tenor.

boost.title: boost <SUB>
boost.description: Used to manage Boost Announcements for this Guild from the Bot.

channel.title: channel [SUB]
channel.description: Shows the currently set Channel for Nitro Boost Announcements.

set.title: set [CHANNEL]
set.description: Sets the Channel for Nitro Boost Announcements.

test.title: test
test.description: Tests Nitro Boost Announcements by sending the Announcement either to the specified Channel or the default one.

channel.title: channel <SUB>
channel.description: Manages Private Voice and Text Channels.

create.title: create [NAME...]
create.description: Creates a new Private Voice Channel.

category.title: category [SUB]
category.description: Shows the Category for new Private Channels.

set.title: set <CHANNEL>
set.description: Sets the Category for new Private Channels.

voice-creation-channel.title: voice-creation-channel [SUB]
voice-creation-channel.description: Shows the Channel that an User should join to automatically create a new Voice Channel.

template-role.title: template-role <SUB>
template-role.description: Manages Template Roles for new Channels' Permissions.

everyone.title: everyone [SUB]
everyone.description: Shows the Template Role for Everyone.

set.title: set [ROLE]
set.description: Sets the Template Role for Everyone.

owner.title: owner [SUB]
owner.description: Shows the Template Role for the Channel Owner.

set.title: set [ROLE]
set.description: Sets the Template Role for the Channel Owner.

counter.title: counter [SUB]
counter.description: Shows the current count of this Channel.

start.title: start
start.description: Starts a new Counter in this Channel.

terminate.title: terminate [CHANNEL]
terminate.description: Removes the Counter in this Channel or the one specified.

config.title: config <SUB>
config.description: Used to configure Counter Channel settings.

allow-messages.title: allow-messages <'true'|'false'>
allow-messages.description: If false Messages that aren't numbers will be deleted.

allow-errors.title: allow-errors <'true'|'false'>
allow-errors.description: If false Messages that are the wrong number will be ignored and deleted.

alternate-member.title: alternate-member <'true'|'false'>
alternate-member.description: If true Messages that would change the count that are sent from the same person who changed it last time will be ignored and deleted.

best.title: best
best.description: Replies with the best count this Channel has reached.

list.title: list
list.description: Shows all active Counters in this Guild.

credits.title: credits [SUB|USER]
credits.description: Shows your credits on this Guild.

worst.title: worst [BOARD SIZE 0:10]
worst.description: Shows the worst performing users credit wise.

apply.title: apply <USER> <FORMULA ;; REASON...>
apply.description: Applies a formula to someone's credits.
longDescription: Applies a formula to someone's credits.
To **separate the formula from the reason** use `;;`:
You can **reference the user's old credits** using the variables: `x`, `c`, `credits`

award.title: award <USER> <CREDITS> <REASON...>
award.description: Awards credits to the user with the specified reason.

set.title: set <USER> <CREDITS> <REASON...>
set.description: Sets someone's credits with the specified reason.

reset.title: reset <USER> <REASON...>
reset.description: Resets someone's credits with the specified reason.

set.title: set <LANGUAGE>
set.description: Sets this guild's language to the one specified.

notify.title: notify <SUB>
notify.description: Manages text channel notifications for specific events.

voice.title: voice <SUB>
voice.description: Manages text channel notifications for voice-specific events.

join.title: join <SUB>
join.description: Manages text channel notifications for voice channel join events.

add.title: add <VOICE CHANNEL> <TEXT CHANNEL> <MESSAGE...>
add.description: Adds a new event listener for the specified voice channel on the specified text channel using the specified text as a response.
longDescription: Adds a new event listener for the specified voice channel on the specified text channel using the specified text as a response.
**Valid variables for the message are the following:**

remove.title: remove <CHANNEL>
remove.description: Removes the event listener from the specified voice channel (If present).

list.title: list <SUB|CHANNEL>
list.description: Shows where notifications for a specific voice channel are sent to and the text that is sent to that text channel.

all.title: all
all.description: Lists all voice channels with events and their target channel.

add.title: add <TWITCH CHANNEL USERNAME> <TEXT CHANNEL> <MESSAGE...>
add.description: Subscribes for notifications from the specified Twitch channel which will be sent to a text channel using the specified text as a response.
longDescription: Subscribes for notifications from the specified Twitch channel which will be sent to a text channel using the specified text as a response.
**Valid variables for the message are the following:**

remove.title: remove <TWITCH CHANNEL ID>
remove.description: Unsubscribes from the specified Twitch channel.

list.title: list <SUB|TWITCH CHANNEL ID>
list.description: Shows where notifications for a specific Twitch channel are sent to and the text that is sent to that text channel.

add.title: add <YOUTUBE CHANNEL ID> <TEXT CHANNEL> <MESSAGE...>
add.description: Subscribes for notifications from the specified YouTube channel which will be sent to a text channel using the specified text as a response.
longDescription: Subscribes for notifications from the specified YouTube channel which will be sent to a text channel using the specified text as a response.
**Valid variables for the message are the following:**

remove.title: remove <YOUTUBE CHANNEL ID>
remove.description: Unsubscribes from the specified YouTube channel.

list.title: list <SUB|YOUTUBE CHANNEL ID>
list.description: Shows where notifications for a specific YouTube channel are sent to and the text that is sent to that text channel.

message.title: message
message.description: Sends a message and calculates the time needed for that message to be sent.

set.title: set <PREFISSO>
set.description: Sets this Guild's prefix to the one specified.

managers.title: managers <SUB>
managers.description: Manages role managers of this guild.

add.title: add <MANAGER ROLE> <ROLE...>
add.description: Adds all the specified roles to the manager.

remove.title: remove <SUB|<MANAGER ROLE> <ROLE...>>
remove.description: Removes all the specified roles from the manager.

all.title: all
all.description: Removes all roles from the specified manager.

list.title: list <SUB|ROLE>
list.description: Lists all roles manageable by the specified manager.

all.title: all
all.description: Lists all manager roles and their manageable roles.

clear.title: clear
clear.description: Removes all managers from this guild.

add.title: add <USER> <ROLE...>
add.description: Adds all specified roles to the user.

remove.title: remove <USER> <ROLE...>
remove.description: Removes all specified roles from the user.

shortcuts.title: shortcuts [SUB]
shortcuts.description: Shows if shortcuts are enabled in this Guild.

set.title: set <'true'|'false'>
set.description: Enables or disables shortcuts for this Guild.

sound.title: sound <SUB|SOUND>
sound.description:
Plays the specified sound.
Use `sound play` if a sound has the same name as a subcommand.

stop.title: stop
stop.description: Stops playing the currently playing Sound if any.

leave.title: leave
leave.description: Leaves the current channel if connected.

play.title: play <SOUND>
play.description:
Plays the specified sound.
This is an alias for `sound`, use this is a sound has the same name as a subcommand.

suggestion.title: suggestion <SUB|SUGGESTION...>
suggestion.description: Sends a new suggestion for the guild.

channel.title: channel [SUB]
channel.description: Shows the current channel for suggestions.

set.title: set [CHANNEL]
set.description: Sets the current channel for suggestions.

result.title: result [SUB]
result.description: Shows the current channel for suggestion results.

set.title: set [CHANNEL]
set.description: Sets the current channel for suggestion results.

approve.title: approve <ID> <REASON...>
approve.description: Approves the specified suggestion with the specified reason.

reject.title: reject <ID> <REASON...>
reject.description: Rejects the specified suggestion with the specified reason.

time.title: time <DATE>
time.description: Replies with Discord's Date Formats which reference the specified Date.
longDescription: Replies with Discord's Date Formats which reference the specified Date.
You can also specify an **offset from today's date**: https://day.js.org/docs/en/manipulate/add
